title: There needs to be a way I can unattach a Yuumi from me
body:
Picks {{champion:523}}  calls mid, cuz its a bot game I wanna practice

guy says "bish" in champ select and picks {{champion:350}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:12}}  with {{item:1001}} {{item:2003}}  and proceeds ti attach to me

I ask the yuumi to get off me and go somewhere else
Yuumi stays

No matter what I did Yuumi would attach to me and sit there so i was horribly underleveled 
next up she gets{{item:3117}} {{item:3113}}  and proceeds to just sit there as I get slaughtered by a level 8 Zyra (I had disconnected and reconnected in the hopes the Yuumi would leave and go help the Vayne top however when I got back in (about a minute later) Yuumi was still sitting the attached to me in spawn spam laughing)
I figure if this trolling Yuumi is gonna be attached to me I might as well try to work with it
We're at level 5, 5 levels behind the Zyra at this point so I ask yuumi to
"Heal me at least"
to which Yuumi pings *at level 5 mind you E-not learned yet

yuumi only ever ulted behind me so i'd have to run in weird ways to pull it off
{{champion:350}} {{item:3907}}  finally starts useing E 

"greek yogurt is great, dinner and a show that dc was great Aph"

If {{champion:223}} can't just eat you and keep you in his stomach Yuumi shouldn't be able to just sit attached to me if I don't want her there

for the record that Yuumi used Q 0 times that game

at this point out of fear that another game will go as horribly I will be dodging any game with yuumi in it until this happens
